name: Pencil Game
description:
A platformer where your one tool with many uses is a pencil.  You can draw and erase different shapes to get through the level. Eventually, we will add combat and more levels.

Use ASD or arrows to move, W or space to jump

Select shapes or eraser on the left, then click the mouse to use.

Watch your graphite level (mana) in bottom left, erase to get back cost of shape.

There is no objective, we plan to add floating with the balloon and actual levels. This is our first time making a game and it was done in 24 hours.

Credit

Programming: Gabriel Warkentin, Cooper Santillan

Art: Gina Ha

Sound: Gabriel Warkentin
